sentences.en: Being caught a third time will incur a hefty fine of $ 180.
sentences.cn: 第三次被抓住需要交180美元的罚款.

sentences.en: But I can tell you, it's probably a hefty fine!
sentences.cn: 但我告诉你:这可是要罚很多钱的!

sentences.en: Cows munch mostly grasses and hay - yet they grow big and hefty.
sentences.cn: 牛吃的是草,但却长得身高体壮.

sentences.en: Don had a hefty roll of flab overhanging his waistband.
sentences.cn: 唐的腰间沉甸甸地坠着一圈赘肉。

sentences.en: Her brothers were both hefty men in their forties.
sentences.cn: 她的两个兄弟都是四十多岁，身高体壮。

sentences.en: I bit into a hefty slab of bread and cheese. When I had got it down I started talking.
sentences.cn: 我咬了一大块面包和奶酪，强咽下去之后开始说话。

sentences.en: If he is found guilty he faces a hefty fine.
sentences.cn: 如果被判有罪，他就要面临巨额罚款。

sentences.en: Just look at him , a big, hefty fellow as worked up as a child!
sentences.cn: 瞧他这样, 身大力不亏的,还和小孩一样呢,倒是真着急!

sentences.en: Lambert gave Luckwell a hefty shove to send him on his way.
sentences.cn: 兰伯特用力推了勒克韦尔一把，把他送上了路。

sentences.en: She was quite a hefty woman.
sentences.cn: 她是个身材高大的女子。

sentences.en: The film also contains a hefty dose of comedy.
sentences.cn: 这部电影同样带有浓厚的喜剧色彩.

sentences.en: There are hefty charges across the board for one-way rental.
sentences.cn: 各处对单程租赁的收费都很高。

sentences.en: We have a hefty dossier on his exploits in the war.
sentences.cn: 关于他在战争中的英勇事迹,我们有相当多的资料.

words.tran_cn: 重的；肌肉发达的；异常大的
